title: [FR] Smart connection groups e.g. connected, recent
author: thd99
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
It would be really useful to have a couple of 'smart' connection groups or folders which are separate to the opened connections file. These are most useful when you working with a large number of connections / folders.

- Connected - shows all connections currently connected to. Makes it easier to switch to the correct tab when many tabs open
- Recent - shows connections recently used (e.g. last 10 or 20). Makes it easier to...
